messages.content: Create a list of 2 blog post titles
Make sure there's no custom variables such as 202x or [name].

Make sure these are blog posts related to high traffic keywords and can rank for SEO.

We're offering wedding DJ services, and are looking to get our blogs in front of anyone potentially getting married or planning a wedding. We can cover any high traffic keyword related to music and weddings or DJing.

For example:
1. top wedding songs to play at a wedding
2. top michael jackson hits to play at a wedding
3. should I tip a DJ?
4. how much does a DJ cost?
Create an blog post outline for this blog post idea: {{33.value}}.

Make sure to use markdown on the outline. 
Make sure to have lists in bunches of 3 or greater. If a section is oriented around a list, then provide at least 10, unless it's not possible. For example, if the list is "top hits from the 90s", you'll want to provide more 10 or more song choices.

Please create a blog post around this topic:
{{9.choices[].message.content}}

Make sure to use markdown on the outline. 
The blog length should be 1,200 words.
Make sure to have lists in bunches of 3 or greater. If a section is oriented around a list, then provide at least 10, unless it's not possible. For example, if the list is "top hits from the 90s", you'll want to provide more 10 or more song choices.
Make sure that there's no custom variables that aren't complete. For example, do not leave things as 202x or [Your Name]. 
Here's the info about my company:
Name: ABC Company
Industry: wedding DJ
Objective: to provide a very informative blog post to pontential clients looking to hire wedding DJ services
Tone of voice: fun, lively, and engaging. I want it to be funny at times, and have it seem as though you're smiling while writing the blog post.
​

I want you to re-write this blog post SEO friendly:
{{12.choices[].message.content}}

Make this blog post SEO friendly by:
Including 5 different keywords this article could rank for.
Incorporating these 5 keywords with a keyword density of about 3-5%. For example, if the blog post is 1,200 words, there shoudl be between 36-60 keywords in the blog post.
Make sure the top keyword is in the header title, and found in the first 150 words of the article.
Make sure that there are at least 3 headers with a keyword in them.

I want you to re-write this blog post to make sure there's no grammar or spelling mistakes and make it appear more natural, at a grade 5 level:
{{12.choices[].message.content}}
Please make sure the blog post appears more human, natural and at a grade 5 level, without any spelling, punctuation or grammar mistakes

mapper.prompt:
Create an header image for this blog post:
{{33.value}}
